title: How was the Inheritance Tax (IHT) form submitted
question: How was the Inheritance Tax (IHT) form submitted?
paragraph1: Say how it will be sent if you haven’t sent it yet.
paragraph2: HMRC has closed the online ‘Register to complete an Inheritance Tax estate report’ service. However, if you submitted an IHT form using that HMRC service last year, you can still use the Inheritance Tax Identifier you received here.

method.required: Choose post or HMRC online service
